scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp package*.json dist && gcloud functions deploy bgg-games-ranks-parser --gen2 --trigger-http --runtime nodejs20 --entry-point=main --allow-unauthenticated --region=us-central1 --source=dist --update-build-env-vars="GOOGLE_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=" --project zinovik-project
scripts.service:account: gcloud iam service-accounts keys create key-file.json --iam-account=zinovik-project@appspot.gserviceaccount.com
